biotools.summary: PLEXY is a tool for computation of optimal thermodynamical interactions of a box C/D snoRNA with a putative target RNA. It is based on RNAPLEX.

bioschemas.name: PLEXY
bioschemas.summary: PLEXY is a tool for computation of optimal thermodynamical interactions of a box C/D snoRNA with a putative target RNA. It is based on RNAPLEX.
